issue.title: Manage external files retention time
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

With easySDI 4.3, the new "SHOP webservice ":https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/wiki/4_shop_rest offers the ability to transmit a +binary file+ *OR* +file URL+ (external file).

Problem is: In case of external file we don't manage a retention time, but files aren't eternal... so we have to remove download link after a while.

We propose to add an "external file retention time" parameter (as global shop parameter). Values would be days (integer), 0 is "infinite" (default).
This will allow easySDI to remove links from order summaries after the desired time (like we do with local stored files).
